metadata.title: CVE-2024-38563 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: mt76: mt7996: fix potential memory leakage when reading chiptemperatureWithout this commit, reading chip temperature will cause memory leakage.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
